titleStmt.title: Medulla Novi Testamenti: The substance of the New Testament more especially of the historical; with a brief account of the doctrinal part, in each book, by way of dialogue between a divine and his parishioner. Designed for the benefit of private families. By Thomas Stanhope, peacher at the Fleet. Imprimatur, W. Jane.
titleStmt.author: Stanhope, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by A.G. and J.P. and are to sold by Nath. Rolles, at th Golden Key in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With errata at end of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
